1.やりなおしの宝珠を 捧げることで|スキルの振り直しが可能です。|スキルを振り直し: By offering a Regretta Stone, you can set the|skill points of one skill line.|Reset your skill points?|<yesno><close>

4.振り直すスキルを 選んでください。|<break>: Please choose a skill line to reset.|<break>

6.やりなおしの宝珠は 青い炎に|吸い込まれていった……。|<end>: The Regretta Stone was engulfed by the blue|flame...|<end>

7.全やりなおしの宝珠を捧げると|全てのスキルが 振り直されます。|<br>|振り直:
If you use a Resettall Stone, all skill points|of all vocations will be refunded.|
|Your current skill and spell positions will|stay as they after using this item.|Reset skill points of all vocations?|

8.「<%sC_ITEM>は ひとつ| <%nC_gold>ゴールドになるが| この: One <%sC_ITEM> costs <%dC_gold> Gold.|This is the one you'd like?|<yesno><close>

9.捧げる宝珠を 選んでください。|<break>: Please choose a jewel to offer.|<break>

10.「では 確かに <%nC_gold>ゴールド受け取った。| やりなおしの宝珠を: Thank you. Please take this stone.

12.「そうか……。| では 必要になったら また来るがいい。: I see... Please come back when you need to.

13.「……ふむ。| しかし 所持金が 足りないようだな。| 出直してくるがよい。: Hmm... it seems you're short on money. Come|back when you have enough.

14.「宝珠を 青い炎に捧げた後も| 呪文や特技の表示内容は 一度変更するまで| 今の:
Even after offering the jewel to the blue|flame, your current skill and spell positions will|stay as they are.|
|I've placed the <%sC_ITEM> into|your bag. Please return here if you need my|services again.

15.全やりなおしの宝珠は 青い炎に|吸いこまれていった……。|<end>: The Resettall Stone was engulfed by the|blue flame...|<end>

16.「……ふむ。| しかし そなたの持ち物が いっぱいのようだ。| かばんを空けて: Hmm... It seems you're carrying too much.|Please make some room and come back.

18.<select_se_off>|やりなおしの宝珠(3000Ｇ)|職やりなおしの宝: <select_se_off>|Regretta Stone (3000 G)|Resetta Stone (10000 G)|Resettall Stone (30000 G)|<select_end><break>

19.青い炎が 神々しく燃えさかっている。: It's a blue flame, burning with a divine|power.

20.「バグレア教会跡地に| ガミルゴの護符を納めた そなたには| 闘神ラダ・ガートの:
You have placed Gamilgo's Amulet in the|Bagulea Church Vestige, and have been blessed|by Lada Gart, the god of war.|
|By offering a stone to that blue flame, Lada|Gart shall answer you and help you to reset|your skill points.|
|The stones you can offer are sold here for a|nominal fee. Would you like to buy any?|

21.「私は オーグリード大陸 ガートラント王国が| 建国王 闘神ラダ・ガートの遺志を:
I am the founder of the Kingdom of Gartlant,|and the legacy of Lada Gart, the god of war.|I came to this land to help more travelers.|
|You have been blessed by Lada Gart|himself, so do not worry. You may reset|your skill points here as well.|
|If you offer a stone to the blue flame in|Gartlant, you may reset your skill points.|
|You can buy the stones here for a nominal fee.|Would you like to buy one?|

22.「ガートラント王国から持ってきた あの青い炎の| 種火に やりなおしの宝珠を捧げ:
If you offer a stone to the blue flame in|Gartlant, you can reset your skill points.|
|You can buy the stones here for a nominal fee.|Would you like to buy one?|

25.捧げる宝珠を 選んでください。|マスタースキルポイントは ここでは|振り直すこと: Choose a stone to offer. Please remember that|Master Skill Points will not be reset.|<break>

26.ここで スキルの振り直しが できるようだ。|<color_yellow>※つかう: You can reassign your skills here...<color_yellow>Even if it's from an infinite number of redone stones<color_white>|<color_yellow>I can reset my skill points...<color_white>Do you want to reset your current skill|points?<yesno><close>

You have rescued the lost souls of the|Bagulea Church Vestige, and have been blessed|by Lada Gart, the god of war.|
